title: Zine El Abidine Ben Ali
summary: Zine El Abidine Ben Ali (Arabic: زين العابدين بن علي‎, romanized: Zayn al-'Ābidīn bin 'Alī; 3 September 1936 – 19 September 2019), commonly known as Ben Ali (Arabic: بن علي‎) or Ezzine (Arabic: الزين‎), was a Tunisian politician who served as the 2nd president of Tunisia from 1987 until his fall in 2011 after the revolution of Tunisia.
